original_title: Ein halber Cent (oder die totale Destruktion des Ungewissen) f√ºr einen Blick auf das Chaos am Silver Screen
overview: An experimental short film that combines video clips and animations. Characterized by fast editing and an intense audio mix consisting of screams, voices and shrill sounds, the project is an abstract image of the filmmaker's own mind.
title: Half a Cent (or the total Destruction of the Uncertain) for a Glimpse of the Chaos on the Silver Screen
